list.title: Hello World!
tips: flair is a global variable added by loading flair.js library.

list.title: Class
list.desc: Simple class definition, the flair way.
tips:
Flair keywords are available when code is bundled inside flair assembly, for other uses, include all required keywords as
const { Class, typeOf } = flair; before their use.
Note Class starts with capital 'C', and 'O' in typeOf is capital as well. Therefore no conflict with ES6's 'class' and javascript's 'typeof'.
logger() is not a flair keyword, but a helper function to show result value here.

list.title: Derived Class
list.desc: Single parent inheritance with controlled member overriding.
tips: $$ and $$() function defines the scope identifiers and attributes for following member.
abstract and virtual members can be overridden in derived class.
Further overriding of a member can be stopped using sealed when overriding.
